member.name: IObjectArray.GetAt
member.summary: Provides a pointer to a specified object's interface. The object and interface are specified by index and interface ID.
member.param: Reference to the desired interface ID.
Receives the interface pointer requested in riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IObjectArray.GetCount
member.summary: Provides a count of the objects in the collection.
member.param: The number of objects in the collection.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IObjectArray
member.summary: Exposes methods that enable clients to access items in a collection of objects that support .
